mapper.select: SELECT D1.BLD_CD , D1.BLD_NM FROM TB_OGBS_BLD_BAS D1 /* 빌딩기본 */ INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN D1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD = '3' THEN ( SELECT BLD_CD FROM TB_OGBS_BLD_BAS WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND OG_TP_CD = 'W02' AND BLD_CD = D1.STR_WARE_NO ) ELSE ( SELECT S2.BLD_CD FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ S1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ S2 ON S2.BASE_YM = S1.BASE_YM AND S2.OG_TP_CD = S1.OG_TP_CD AND S2.OG_ID = S1.OG_ID WHERE S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S1.OG_TP_CD = 'W02' AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S2.OG_TP_CD = 'W02' AND S1.BASE_YM = D1.MNGT_YM AND S1.PRTNR_NO = D1.STR_WARE_NO ) END AS BLD_CD FROM TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_IZ D1 WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_STAT_CD = '30' AND D1.MNGT_YM BETWEEN #{mngtYmFrom} AND #{mngtYmTo} ) D2 ON D2.BLD_CD = D1.BLD_CD WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D1.OG_TP_CD = 'W02' ORDER BY D1.BLD_NM

SELECT D1.PD_CD , D1.PD_NM , D1.PD_ABBR_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS D1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT CSMB_PD_CD FROM TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_IZ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_STAT_CD = '30' AND MNGT_YM BETWEEN #{mngtYmFrom} AND #{mngtYmTo} ) D2 ON D2.CSMB_PD_CD = D1.PD_CD WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D1.PD_TP_CD = 'M' ORDER BY D1.PD_NM
